Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Word of Truth]; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Glimpse the Truth]

You pierce lies and discover the truth.
name: Truth Domain
